name.description: Name that identifies this topic instance uniquely.

description.description: Description of the topic instance. What it has and how to use it.

service.description: Link to the messaging service where this topic is hosted in

partitions.description: Number of partitions into which the topic is divided.

schemaText.description: Schema used for message serialization. Optional as some topics may not have associated schemas.

cleanupPolicies.description: Topic clean up policy. For Kafka - `cleanup.policy` configuration.

retentionTime.description: Retention time in milliseconds. For Kafka - `retention.ms` configuration.

maximumMessageSize.description: Maximum message size in bytes. For Kafka - `max.message.bytes` configuration.

minimumInSyncReplicas.description: Minimum number replicas in sync to control durability. For Kafka - `min.insync.replicas` configuration.

retentionSize.description: Maximum size of a partition in bytes before old data is discarded. For Kafka - `retention.bytes` configuration.
